verses.verse: A Prayer <WH8605> of David <WH1732>. Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the right <WH6664>, O YY <WH3068>, attend <WH7181> <WH8685> unto my cry <WH7440>, give ear <WH238> <WH8685> unto my prayer <WH8605>, that goeth not <WH3808> out of feigned <WH4820> lips <WH8193>.
Let my sentence <WH4941> come forth <WH3318> <WH8799> from thy presence <WH6440>; let thine eyes <WH5869> behold <WH2372> <WH8799> the things that are equal <WH4339>.

Thou hast proved <WH974> <WH8804> mine heart <WH3820>; thou hast visited <WH6485> <WH8804> me in the night <WH3915>; thou hast tried <WH6884> <WH8804> me, and shalt find <WH4672> <WH8799> nothing; I am purposed <WH2161> <WH8800> that my mouth <WH6310> shall not transgress <WH5674> <WH8799>.
Concerning the works <WH6468> of men <WH120>, by the word <WH1697> of thy lips <WH8193> I have kept <WH8104> <WH8804> me from the paths <WH734> of the destroyer <WH6530>.
Hold up <WH8551> <WH8800> my goings <WH838> in thy paths <WH4570>, that my footsteps <WH6471> slip <WH4131> <WH8738> not.

I have called <WH7121> <WH8804> upon thee, for thou wilt hear <WH6030> <WH8799> me, O 'Elohim <WH410>: incline <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241> unto me, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my speech <WH565>.

Shew thy marvellous <WH6395> <WH8685> lovingkindness <WH2617>, O thou that savest <WH3467> <WH8688> by thy right hand <WH3225> them which put their trust <WH2620> <WH8802> in thee from those that rise up <WH6965> <WH8693> against them.
Keep <WH8104> <WH8798> me as the apple <WH380> of the eye <WH1323> <WH5869>, hide <WH5641> <WH8686> me under the shadow <WH6738> of thy wings <WH3671>,
From <WH6440> the wicked <WH7563> that <WH2098> oppress <WH7703> <WH8804> me, from my deadly <WH5315> enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, who compass me about <WH5362> <WH8686>.
They are inclosed <WH5462> <WH8804> in their own fat <WH2459>: with their mouth <WH6310> they speak <WH1696> <WH8765> proudly <WH1348>.
They have now compassed <WH5437> <WH8804> us in our steps <WH838>: they have set <WH7896> <WH8799> their eyes <WH5869> bowing down <WH5186> <WH8800> to the earth <WH776>;
Like <WH1825> as a lion <WH738> that is greedy <WH3700> <WH8799> of his prey <WH2963> <WH8800>, and as it were a young lion <WH3715> lurking <WH3427> <WH8802> in secret places <WH4565>.

Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, disappoint <WH6923> <WH8761> him <WH6440>, cast him down <WH3766> <WH8685>: deliver <WH6403> <WH8761> my soul <WH5315> from the wicked <WH7563>, which is thy sword <WH2719>:

From men <WH4962> which are thy hand <WH3027>, O YY <WH3068>, from men <WH4962> of the world <WH2465>, which have their portion <WH2506> in this life <WH2416>, and whose belly <WH990> thou fillest <WH4390> <WH8762> with thy hid <WH6840> treasure: they are full <WH7646> <WH8799> of children <WH1121>, and leave <WH3240> <WH8689> the rest <WH3499> of their substance to their babes <WH5768>.
As for me, I will behold <WH2372> <WH8799> thy face <WH6440> in righteousness <WH6664>: I shall be satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799>, when I awake <WH6974> <WH8687>, with thy likeness <WH8544>.
